body.p: The 2018 Conceptual Framework replaces the notion used in the 2010 Conceptual Framework that an inflow or outflow of resources is ‘expected’ with the concept that an asset (or liability) ‘has the potential to produce economic benefits’ (or ‘has the potential to require a transfer of an economic resource’). References to that concept appear in the definition of an economic resource and in the guidance supporting the definition of a liability.
